${ModID}:AmbushMaster.NAME: Ambush Master
${ModID}:AmbushMaster.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, apply !M! kunoichi:Exposed to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Antinomy.NAME: Antinomy
${ModID}:Antinomy.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you trigger kunoichi:Counter, gain !M! Strength.
${ModID}:Antinomy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you trigger kunoichi:Counter, gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:ArteBear.NAME: Arte - Bear Form
${ModID}:ArteBear.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in hand, gain !M! temporary Strength whenever you play another card.

${ModID}:ArteCrane.NAME: Arte - Crane Form
${ModID}:ArteCrane.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in hand, deal !M! damage to a random enemy whenever you play an Attack.

${ModID}:ArteDragon.NAME: Arte - Dragon Form
${ModID}:ArteDragon.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in hand, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies whenever you play another card.

${ModID}:ArtePangolin.NAME: Arte - Pangolin Form
${ModID}:ArtePangolin.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in hand, gain !M! Block whenever you play another card.

${ModID}:ArteTanuki.NAME: Arte - Tanuki Form
${ModID}:ArteTanuki.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL While in hand, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s} whenever you spend Energy.{@@}
${ModID}:ArteTanuki.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in hand, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s} whenever you spend Energy.{@@}

${ModID}:Assassinate.NAME: Assassinate
${ModID}:Assassinate.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deals double damage to kunoichi:Unaware enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:BladeDance.NAME: Blade Dancing
${ModID}:BladeDance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL The next {!M!|1=Attack you play costs 0|>1=!M! Attacks you play cost 0}.{@@}

${ModID}:Blink.NAME: Blink
${ModID}:Blink.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional cards. NL kunoichi:Opener: Draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:Breather.NAME: Breather
${ModID}:Breather.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain {!Kunoichi:M2!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!KunoichiM:2! [E]}. NL kunoichi:Counter: Deal !M! damage back.{@@}

${ModID}:Camouflage.NAME: Camouflage
${ModID}:Camouflage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! kunoichi:Evasion. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ChainLightning.NAME: Chain Lightning
${ModID}:ChainLightning.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each enemy in combat to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ConcussiveStrike.NAME: Concussive Strike
${ModID}:ConcussiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:CourtingDeath.NAME: Courting Death
${ModID}:CourtingDeath.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vulnerable. NL Your Attacks deal double damage for !M! turn{!M!|>1=s}.{@@}

${ModID}:Decoy.NAME: Decoy
${ModID}:Decoy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL Startup: Gain !M! Intangible.

${ModID}:DestroyMorale.NAME: Destroy Morale
${ModID}:DestroyMorale.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever this card enters your hand, apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:DistantStrike.NAME: Distant Strike
${ModID}:DistantStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this did not start the turn in your hand, it costs 0.

${ModID}:DiveForCover.NAME: Dive for Cover
${ModID}:DiveForCover.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Remove !M! of your debuffs.

${ModID}:EntryPlan.NAME: Entry Plan
${ModID}:EntryPlan.DESCRIPTION: Put {!M!|1=a random Attack and Skill|>1=!M! random Attacks and Skills}{@@} from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:EntryPlan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Put {!M!|1=a random Attack and Skill|>1=!M! random Attacks and Skills}{@@} from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ExtremeSpeed.NAME: Extreme Speed
${ModID}:ExtremeSpeed.DESCRIPTION: Draw X cards. NL They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:ExtremeSpeed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw X+1 cards. NL They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FastHands.NAME: Fast Hands
${ModID}:FastHands.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL kunoichi:Uncover !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@}. NL kunoichi:Opener: Play a copy of this card.

${ModID}:FearIsTheWeakness.NAME: Fear is the Weakness
${ModID}:FearIsTheWeakness.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Strength for each enemy that intends to attack.

${ModID}:FindThePath.NAME: Find the Path
${ModID}:FindThePath.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:FindThePath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:FlipKick.NAME: Flip Kick
${ModID}:FlipKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is kunoichi:Unaware, apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable.

${ModID}:GoForTheHeart.NAME: Go for the Heart
${ModID}:GoForTheHeart.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Vulnerable, apply !M! kunoichi:Exposed.

${ModID}:HiddenBlade.NAME: Hidden Blade
${ModID}:HiddenBlade.DESCRIPTION: stslib:Grave. NL Deal !D! damage. NL kunoichi:Opener: Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.{@@}

${ModID}:HiddenSupplies.NAME: Hidden Supplies
${ModID}:HiddenSupplies.DESCRIPTION: stslib:Grave. NL Gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.{@@}

${ModID}:HiddenIntel.NAME: Hidden Intel
${ModID}:HiddenIntel.DESCRIPTION: stslib:Grave. NL At the start of your turn, kunoichi:Survey !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.{@@}

${ModID}:Hightail.NAME: Hightail
${ModID}:Hightail.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! kunoichi:Evasion. NL Exhaust. NL kunoichi:Opener: Don't Exhaust.

${ModID}:Indomitable.NAME: Indomitable
${ModID}:Indomitable.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Infiltrate.NAME: Infiltrate
${ModID}:Infiltrate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:KirinForm.NAME: Kirin Form
${ModID}:KirinForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply !M! kunoichi:Shock.
${ModID}:KirinForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply !M! kunoichi:Shock.

${ModID}:LightningStrike.NAME: Lightning Strike
${ModID}:LightningStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !Kunoichi:D2! damage to a random enemy twice.

${ModID}:LightsOut.NAME: Lights Out
${ModID}:LightsOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@}. NL {!M!|1=It costs|1>=They cost} 0 this turn.

${ModID}:Mislead.NAME: Mislead
${ModID}:Mislead.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak.

${ModID}:PowerupPunch.NAME: Powerup Punch
${ModID}:PowerupPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Prepare.NAME: Prepare
${ModID}:Prepare.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL kunoichi:Counter: Deal !M! damage back.

${ModID}:PressTheAdvantage.NAME: Press the Advantage
${ModID}:PressTheAdvantage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw more than 5 cards in a turn, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:Pulse.NAME: Pulse
${ModID}:Pulse.DESCRIPTION: Gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}{@@}. NL Exhaust. NL kunoichi:Opener: Don't Exhaust.

${ModID}:QuickDraw.NAME: Quick Draw
${ModID}:QuickDraw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL kunoichi:Opener: Gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} and draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.{@@}

${ModID}:QuickThinking.NAME: Quick Thinking
${ModID}:QuickThinking.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you kunoichi:Survey, you may take an additional card.

${ModID}:Raikiri.NAME: Raikiri
${ModID}:Raikiri.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! kunoichi:Shock to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:RelentlessAssault.NAME: Relentless Assault
${ModID}:RelentlessAssault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Increase this card's hits by !Kunoichi:M2! this combat.

${ModID}:Retaliate.NAME: Retaliate
${ModID}:Retaliate.DESCRIPTION: kunoichi:Agile. NL kunoichi:Counter: Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Riposte.NAME: Riposte
${ModID}:Riposte.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL kunoichi:Counter: Deal !M! damage and apply !Kunoichi:M2! Vulnerable back.

${ModID}:RisingEdge.NAME: Rising Edge
${ModID}:RisingEdge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL kunoichi:Opener: {!M!|1=It costs 0 this turn|@=They cost 0 this turn}.{@@}

${ModID}:Sequester.NAME: Sequester
${ModID}:Sequester.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL At the start of your next !M! turns, add a copy of it into your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I need another card to Exhaust.

${ModID}:ShadowBlade.NAME: Shadow Blade
${ModID}:ShadowBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL kunoichi:Counter: Deal this card's damage back.

${ModID}:ShockingGrasp.NAME: Shocking Grasp
${ModID}:ShockingGrasp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! kunoichi:Shock. NL Ignores Block.

${ModID}:Snipe.NAME: Snipe
${ModID}:Snipe.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Deal damage equal to !D! plus !M! times its cost.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I need another card to Exhaust.

${ModID}:Survivalist.NAME: Survivalist
${ModID}:Survivalist.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust up to !M! cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ThunderStep.NAME: Thunder Steps
${ModID}:ThunderStep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! kunoichi:Shock to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ThunderWave.NAME: Thunder Wave
${ModID}:ThunderWave.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! kunoichi:Shock to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:TirelessSpirit.NAME: Tireless Spirit
${ModID}:TirelessSpirit.DESCRIPTION: You may play a card you do not have the Energy for {!M!|1=once|>1=!M! times} per turn.{@@}

${ModID}:Trailblazer.NAME: Trailblazer
${ModID}:Trailblazer.DESCRIPTION: Increase the cards played threshold for kunoichi:Opener effects by !M!.

${ModID}:Truesight.NAME: Truesight
${ModID}:Truesight.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL The next {!Kunoichi:M2!|1=Attack you play costs 0|>1=!Kunoichi:M2! Attacks you play cost 0}{@@}. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:UnseenStrike.NAME: Unseen Strike
${ModID}:UnseenStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy does not intend to attack, deal !D! damage again.

${ModID}:WaterWalking.NAME: Water Walking
${ModID}:WaterWalking.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! kunoichi:Evasion. NL Next turn, gain !M! kunoichi:Evasion.

${ModID}:WindAndSpark.NAME: Wind and Spark
${ModID}:WindAndSpark.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw an Unplayable card, apply !M! kunoichi:Shock to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:WeaponsReady.NAME: Weapons Ready
${ModID}:WeaponsReady.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain kunoichi:Counter: Deal !M! damage back.
